text: When faced with chaos, do you find calm or more energy?
Do surprises make you nervous or excited?
How do you feel about change?
Do you finish what you start?
How do you handle long projects?
Do deadlines motivate you or drain you?
Do you go with your gut or analyze?
When uncertain, do you trust instincts or logic?
Do you make quick or deliberate choices?
Do you assume the best in others?
Are you cautious when meeting new people?
Do you believe most people mean well?
Do you often replay past choices?
How often do you reflect on mistakes?
Do you feel nostalgia or regret more often?
